titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Homeland Security in the One Hundred Eighth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on Homeland Security.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on House Administration. H. Rept. 108-93.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 37.

action.text: Consideration initiated pursuant to a previous order.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 110.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/8/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Provides amounts for expenses of the Select Committee on Homeland Security for the 108th Congress.
